name: HYDE
description:
HYDE is an adventure puzzle game, where you are TORQUE ex spec ops guy who has depressions, and wanna go back to the army but after a strong headache he get a blackout , when he wakes up in the middle of an ancient ruins, don't know how he get there, and it turns out of this ruins are keeping more secrets than it looks like.

Explore a mysterious ancient ruins filled with environmental puzzles, and hidden places to discover.

TORQUE have 2 weapon an assault rifle ,and the kinetic gun, that what he can use to move forward in the game.
You needs to move objects, use your kinetic gun and complete puzzles to get trough the map.

Puzzle elements are essential in the game, i would described as "Uncharted looks/style adventure game"

The game support the 16:9 and 21:9 ratio, with FOV slider, and rendering scale to.

The game using Unreal Engine 4

I am working alone, the whole map in the game is fully custom made.
The game is cost me lot of energy and work , i would like to sell it for reasonable price.

Regards
Mario Murkl
